directions: Blend olive oil, vinegar, Parmesan cheese, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, basil, salt, and black pepper together in a food processor until smooth.
Combine romaine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, black olives, and feta cheese together in large bowl. Drizzle dressing over vegetable mixture; toss to coat.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons dried oregano, or to taste
freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Greek Salad, The Best!
